title: Public opinions on gay marriage in Italy 2016
summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Against and lowest at Response I don´t know.
There is a difference of 44.0 between the maximum Response Against and minimum Response I don´t know.
min_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Against and lowest at Response I don´t know.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Against and lowest at Response I don´t know.
There is a difference of 44.0 between the maximum Response Against and minimum Response I don´t know.
max_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Against and lowest at Response I don´t know.
Response In favor has the second highest value for Share of respondents.
The minimum Response I don´t know has got 6.5 times less Share of respondents than the maximum Response Against.
The Response Against has 1.56 times more Share of respondents than average.
The Share of respondents is 100.0 if we add up values of all Responses.
